title: Taiwan threat from China serious, House GOP chairman says
description: House Select Committee on China chair says the U.S. must take threat seriously.

title: Israeli military: 3 rockets fired from Syria toward Israel
description: A rare attack from the northeastern neighbor comes amid worsening violence.

title: Puppy 'miraculously' survives being tossed from moving vehicle during police chase
description: A puppy emerged unscathed after being tossed from a moving vehicle during a two-hour police chase in Los Angeles, police said.

title: Israelis protest judicial overhaul despite violence surge
description: Thousands gathered for a weekly protest against judicial overhaul plans.

title: 2 more schools in this city to temporarily close after asbestos detected
description: Two Philadelphia schools are immediately closing due to asbestos concerns amid a districtwide review of records on the potentially hazardous mineral fiber.

title: Democrats slam Texas abortion pill ruling but are short on legislative solutions
description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer called the ruling an "awful extreme and unprecedented decision."

title: Show stopper: Singalong fans ejected, 'Bodyguard' halted
description: A British performance of “The Bodyguard” musical screeched to a halt.

title: Police: Fleeing father dropped toddler who died in brook
description: Cops say the man was fleeing the scene of a car crash in northwest Massachusetts

title: Court backs teacher firing over transgender students' names
description: A federal appeals court says school district didn't violate teacher’s rights.

title: Thousands of doctors plan to walk off job again in England
description: The strike could mean postponement of a quarter-million medical appointments.

title: Whirling disease detected at New Mexico fish hatchery
description: Wildlife managers will have fewer rainbow trout to stock in lakes and rivers.

title: Mobile home park residents form co-ops to save their homes
description: Rents are rising at mobile home parks across the country.

title: WATCH:  Dog reunites with owner after more than 100 days apart
description: After a more than 100 days apart, a dog reunited with his owner and couldn’t contain his excitement.

title: Iowa won't pay for rape victims' abortions or contraceptives
description: The Iowa Attorney General’s Office has paused its practice of paying for emergency contraception, and in rare cases abortions, for victims of sexual assault

title: WATCH:  Iowa driver crashes into semi-truck
description: A "distracted" driver is lucky after coming away with just minor injuries when they crashed into a disabled semi-trailer truck, Iowa transportation officials say.

title: Senior skip day shooting injures 6 at South Carolina beach
description: A South Carolina beach partially filled with high school students participating in a “senior skip day” led to a shooting that injured six.

title: Who are the members of the Manhattan DA's team prosecuting Trump?
description: Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg has assembled a team of attorneys with extensive experience investigating white collar crimes to prosecute former President Trump.

title: China begins drills around Taiwan a day after its leader returns from US
description: China says it has started three days of combat readiness patrol exercises around Taiwan, just a day after Taiwan President Tsai returned home from the U.S.

title: Police: 6 people wounded in shooting on South Carolina beach
description: Police in South Carolina say six people have been wounded in a shooting on a beach during a “senior skip day” event involving numerous teenagers

title: Lawyer granted release in $460M 'slip-and-fall' Ponzi scheme
description: A Las Vegas lawyer accused of orchestrating a $460 million Ponzi scheme across the U.S. West has been granted release from federal custody

title: City to pay $500K to settle bikini barista dress code suit
description: A legal battle over a dress code for bikini baristas at coffee stands is ending after a city north of Seattle agreed to pay $500,000 to the owner and employees who sued over it six years ago

title: Police union director fired after opioid smuggling arrest
description: The executive director for a Northern California police union who was charged with attempting to illegally import synthetic opioids from India and other countries has been fired from her job

title: Red Cross confirms contact with Russia about Ukrainian kids
description: The International Committee of the Red Cross says it has been in contact with Russia’s commissioner for children’s rights, who is suspected of war crimes, as it works for the return of Ukrainian children who were deported to Russia

title: North Korea claims another test of underwater nuclear drone
description: North Korea claims it tested this week a second known type of nuclear-capable underwater attack drone designed to destroy naval vessels and ports, adding to a flurry of weapons demonstrations this year that have heightened tensions with rivals

title: 2 men shot to death near beach in Mexican resort of Acapulco
description: Two men who were apparently Mexican tourists have been shot dead and a woman wounded not far from the beach in Mexico's once-glamorous resort of Acapulco

title: Utah man who killed family vented his anger in suicide note
description: A Utah man who fatally shot his wife, her mother and their five kids left a suicide note saying he “would rather rot in hell” than continue being controlled by his wife, investigators wrote in a report released on Friday
